title: Metal Bastard's Best of 2013
description:
Included three massive mixes of songs from Metal Bastard's (metalbastard[dot]tumblr[dot]com) favorite albums of 2013.

Originally posted at the now-defunct blogs Metal Bastard and Metal Bastard Goes Soft. Now check metalbastard[dot]tumblr[dot]com for all your musical needs.
